summary: Frontend testing completed for Maestro Habitat web app. All major UI features verified working correctly. Fixed 1 translation bug in Search page empty state.
passed_tests: Login flow with testuser@maestro.com / TestPass123! - SUCCESS
Home page loads with welcome message 'Welcome back, Test!' and 4 navigation cards
Header shows avatar (T) + name (Test) + role (Parent) on left; MH logo in center; bell, mail, logout icons on right
Bottom navigation visible with 5 items: Home, Search, Bookings, My Kids, Account - correct item highlights when selected
Search page shows Browse Categories grid with 10 category cards (icon + name + subject count)
Clicking a category shows filter controls (category dropdown, subject dropdown, country toggle)
Coach cards display: flag, avatar, name, price, rating, bio, category, subjects, modality
Coach detail page shows: profile section (avatar, name, flag badge, rating, modality, price), About, Subjects pills, Policies, Available Slots, Book Session button
Bookings page has 4 pill tabs: Upcoming, Past, Rescheduled, Cancelled - all properly translated
My Kids page has Add Child button that opens bottom sheet form with Name, Age, Grade, Email, Phone, checkboxes
Account page shows user info (Test User - Parent/Guardian), appearance toggle, 16 menu items with correct icons
Account page has Support section with Contact Us, Help Center, Language
All translations displaying correctly (no raw keys visible after fix)

bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added 'no_results': 'No coaches found' to pages.search section
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Search page empty state was showing raw translation key 'pages.search.no_results' instead of translated text

context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend pages tested and working. Translation fix applied to Search page empty state. Key data-testid patterns: nav-item-{id} for bottom nav, home-card-{id} for home cards, tab-{id} for booking tabs, add-kid-btn for My Kids page. Coach detail page uses /tutor/{id} route. All features from the review request have been verified as working correctly.
